skills.title: Front-End

skills.title: Back-End

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I have strong expertise in UI/UX design, focusing on creating intuitive, user-friendly interfaces using tools like Figma, with a focus on enhancing user experience and visual appeal.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: I specialize in Webflow development, creating interactive, responsive websites with custom animations and integrations, while ensuring optimal performance and SEO.
